name: Aenas-猫与海：序章(Aenas-Cat and The Sea-Prologue)
name_original: Aenas-猫与海：序章(Aenas-Cat and The Sea-Prologue)
description:
What kind of game is this?

This is a game that includes action and story elements.
You can see the appearance of a fantasy world in this game, as well as the story of a little cat lady and her partner before embarking on a journey.
In this game, you will be able to control four characters with different combat styles, traveling through different places in the world.

Inovem is adept at using his own power spear to inflict large-scale and long-range attacks on enemies.

Solumon has a strong physique that can withstand more damage while using his own fists to pave the way.

The Reblac knife technique is sharp and can cause huge damage to enemies, as well as the ability to quickly move to the battlefield that requires oneself.

Our little cat Cheshiry can use its own unique weapon, using different forms to cope with different situations.

Reminders and suggestions for some purchases


The painting style of this work is relatively simple in black and white, which may not be suitable for you.
The action system of this work is relatively simple, and the combat experience is not very exciting.
The story of this work is purely linear and has no other ending.
The difficulty level of this work may be relatively simple. If you are good at playing action games, you can choose a higher difficulty level.

Regarding the release of subsequent updates


Due to loopholes at the beginning of the design of this work, it is very difficult to modify some important mechanisms. We may not have the ability and time to make corrections. Therefore, in subsequent updates, except for fatal bugs, numerical or copywriting issues, we may not make significant modifications to existing mechanisms in the ontology. Please understand.
In addition, we expect to update 2-4 DLC content within a period of time after the release of this work.

Attention


Due to the insufficient technical level of our production team, it may take a long time for the black screen to load when opening this product (internal testing requires waiting for about 30 seconds).

The technical personnel have provided feedback that there is currently no reliable solution, so we apologize for the poor gaming experience caused to you.
If you are unable to accept it, you can try a refund, but we still hope that you can follow our updates and hope that one day you can accept our product.
If you are unable to refund, we are also very sorry for this. Our production team may not be able to fix this issue in the short term. You can choose not to play temporarily and wait until we have the ability to fix it before experiencing it.

In the last


If you are unable to accept our game, we suggest that you consider not making a purchase or refund, but we sincerely invite you to follow our updates.
If you love our game, we would also like to express our sincere gratitude. It is our honor to bring a little joy to your life, and we will work even harder in future updates and works.


We will humbly accept every relevant suggestion and make improvements in future updates and works.
